Name: Other Word
Ingredients: 60 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Mezcal fortifies this Californian riff on the Last Word .
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Eric Alperin at The Varnish in Los Angeles, California. Eric's original recipe, as published in his 2020 book Unvarnished , calls for: 60ml (2oz) Mezcal 30ml (1oz) Lime juice 7.5ml (¼oz) Yellow Chartreuse 7.5ml (¼oz) Maraska Maraschino Cherry Liqueur 5ml (barspoon) Agave syrup.
Nutrition: One serving of Other Word contains 186 calories
